meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or pleasant to drink.
meanings.sent1: The drinkability of the water was excellent, making it refreshing and enjoyable to consume.
meanings.sent2: I always consider the drinkability of a juice before buying it, to ensure it will be easy to drink.
meanings.sent3: The drinkability of the tea was so good that I couldn't stop sipping it with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The drinkability of the lemonade was like a cool breeze on a hot day, instantly quenching my thirst.
meanings.sent5: Herbal teas are known for their exceptional drinkability, making them a popular choice for many people.

meanings.definition: The ability of a beverage to be consumed easily or without difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The drinkability of the soda was high, as it went down smoothly without any effort.
meanings.sent2: When hosting a party, it's important to offer beverages with good drinkability for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The drinkability of the milkshake was so impressive that I finished it in record time.
meanings.sent4: The drinkability of the smoothie was like a dance of flavors on my taste buds, making it a delightful experience.
meanings.sent5: The drinkability of the iced tea was exceptional, making it a perfect choice for a hot summer day.
